SEARCH
Package com.budgetapp.methods

Class Methods

java.lang.Object
com.budgetapp.methods.Methods
public class Methods extends Object
Utility class providing common methods for input handling and database operations. This class contains static methods for various input validations and database operations.

    • hashPassword

      public static String hashPassword(String password)
      Performs a simple password hashing by shifting each character by 10 positions.
      Parameters:
      password - The plain text password to be hashed
      Returns:
      A hashed version of the password where each character is shifted by 10 positions
